intent: yoLauncher my modpack did not install correctly
responses: It seems like the modpack encountered an issue. Try reinstalling or checking for updates! here is some information: https://lifxmod.com/troubleshooting/using-yo-launcher-my-modpack-did-not-install-correctly.html

Looks like the modpack didn't load as expected. Let’s troubleshoot: check your version and dependencies, here is some information: https://lifxmod.com/troubleshooting/using-yo-launcher-my-modpack-did-not-install-correctly.html
If the modpack isn’t installing correctly, try clicking uninstall on the modpack in yo launcher, closing it and trying again, make sure you are not loaded into the game whilst doing this..
It looks like the new object isn't loading correctly. Check if all dependencies are installed or try restarting. https://lifxmod.com/troubleshooting/how-to-map-materials-to-a-new-mod-object.html
If the new item or object isn’t visible, make sure it’s fully loaded and not conflicting with another mod. https://lifxmod.com/troubleshooting/how-to-map-materials-to-a-new-mod-object.html
Having trouble loading new objects? Ensure your modpack is fully updated and try reloading. https://lifxmod.com/troubleshooting/how-to-map-materials-to-a-new-mod-object.html
She's a beauty.
She's mine!
